songs.lyrics:
Haakim Entertainment, Blue Print
Yama Soda

[Chorus] x2
Ma hun raachhyas, bhaan kaha bhagches
Ta jasto manchhe le k po garna sakches

[Verse 1] [Yama Buddha]
Oe tori, yeta sun khan kholi
Banduk ko goli bhanda tej yo manche ko boli
Babu sapana boli, bipana aaja
Kun tolko hero tah yo ho mero rajya
Chhaina kehi ko baal, ma hun tero kaal
Aaudai chhu tero gharma sakchhas bhane bhaagi na haal
Yo thauma tero bau chhaina kunai sawal
Sahar gau jata jau tetai garchhu babaal
Mukh ragat bhanda rato, rish aago bhanda taato
Banayera naango lyauchhu terai gharko baato
Laato bhanda laato gadha pani syal bhanda baatho
Tyesko saato aba chak mero jutta ko maato
Ma bish bhanda bishalu chhu, sip bhanda sipalu chhu
Soltini haru ko lagi ni King cobra nikaldachhu
Doryayera aaudachu chandrama jhai
Aru chai bachirakh aba sapana mai

[Chorus] x4
Ma hun raachhyas, bhaan kaha bhagches
Ta jasto manchhe le k po garna sakches

[Verse 2] [Hakim]
My god, [?]
Aago mero boli, hallachu pura anchal
Aashirbaad chha mero sir ma mahadev bhole Shankar
Sabai jana don, ma don haru ko uncle
[?]
Side laag fuchhe, puglas pallo ghaam
Chha tero gang, tyesaile thulo saan
Mutauna ta jasto lai kaafi chha mero naam
Ki bhaag, ki luk, ki mil ki jhuuk
Puchhar hallaudai hul ma na jhuk
Bhagihaal hero naher mero mukh
Chham tero bhanda thulo mero bandook
Ahankar ma mathi, nabhula tero chhati
Rati aaye tero ghar ma kati dinchhu ghaati
Maidan chhodi sabai jana bhagyo tero saathi
Ma hun racchhyas, tero soch bhanda mathi

[Chorus] x4
Ma hun raachhyas, bhaan kaha bhagches
Ta jasto manchhe le k nai garna sakches

[Verse 3] [Soda]
Jun goru ko singh chhaina, usko nau thike
Hero huna nakhoj dherai you will always be a dickhead
Naachna najanne aagan tedho
Sabai jana don tara don ko uncle mero
Tero soch bhanda mathi
Ta jasta kati aaye kati gaye her kamila ka taati
Aatichhas bhane raak haat mero ghati mathi
Ani tyespachhi matra kura hunchha sathi
Baagh budo rah syaal tanneri
Raachhyas deklas sutna khojda sapanama feri
Paap rah punya jandina ma
Hune biruwa ko chillo paath mandina ma
Saan dina ma handina
Ta jasto paaji lai manche kahile gandina
Raachhyas hun ma, raachhyas hunchhu
Tero laagi vane kahile bhagwan bandina

[Chorus] x4
Ma hun raachhyas, bhaan kaha bhagches
Ta jasto manchhe le k po garna sakches
songs.title: Raachhyas
